Class DefaultCredentialsFactory

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICredentialsFactory

    public class DefaultCredentialsFactory
extends Object
implements ICredentialsFactory
    This is the factory that uses Credentials instance giving by either class name or implementation instead of factory given bey user.
